title: The Three Survival Strategies of 2025
author: Hass Dhia
excerpt: As the year closes, clear patterns emerge in who's thriving and who's struggling. The winners aren't who you'd expect.

sources.title: The revenge of the '90s mall brand
The winners and losers of tariffs
The anatomy of an agency chief client officer

linkedinTeaser:
The fog cleared in 2025. Tariffs hit Depression-era levels. Mall traffic kept declining. Yet some businesses thrived.

The pattern? They stopped optimizing yesterday's game and started playing tomorrow's.

Gap used nostalgia as cover for operational transformation. ThredUp was already positioned where tariffs couldn't reach. Agencies invested in human relationships precisely because AI made them more valuable.

The losers played the old game better than anyone. The winners noticed the game had changed.

What game are you playing?
